welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Middlesex Centre, Canada! Prepare to be charmed by our quaint towns, picturesque landscapes, and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Regional Terminal
terminals.description: The regional terminal at London International Airport serves smaller regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Centralia Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Centralia Airport is responsible for handling all cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pembroke Area Municipal Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Pembroke Area Municipal Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
